document.full_text: benin's highest court on wednesday rejected an appeal by opposition candidates to annul the west african nation's march 13 presidential election, confirming that incumbent boni yayi had won a second term.
document.title: benin court clears yayi second term election win
lines_and_colors: benin's highest court on wednesday rejected an appeal by opposition candidates to annul the west african nation's march 13 presidential election, confirming that incumbent boni yayi had won a second term.
